LanguageData.JRWMicroceratus.label: Microceratus
LanguageData.JRWMicroceratus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #06755-1953 [MICROCERATUS GOBIENSIS] CODENAME: LITTLE-HORN >445
A small ceratopsian dinosaur. Often found living in small herds, juveniles often look after hatchlings as adults forage and scout out new territory.
LanguageData.JRWMicroceratus.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.JRWMicroceratus.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
LanguageData.JRWMicroceratus.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.JRWMicroceratus.tools.head.label: head
